lines.text: If you ever get hungry, our garden back home is full of snails. We tried everything to get rid of them. We never thought of a Frenchman!
You have muddled everything from the start, taking that child with you from Marrakesh. Don't you realize that Americans dislike having their children stolen?
Sorry we were gone so long, but we had to pick up Hank!
You know what I was just thinking? You know what is paying for this three days in Marrakech?
. And you know the purse I bought in Paris? Philip's tarsal.

[dying]
A man... a statesman... is to be killed... assassinated in London. Soon... very soon. Tell them in London... tell them to try Ambrose Chapel...
I see. And what do you buy and sell?
Remember, you will only have time for just one shot. If you need another, the risk is yours.
